pr_title: [FLINK-16008][table-planner][table-planner-blink] Add rules to transpose the join condition of Python Correlate node

timeline.bodyText:
If we only support INNER, we need to also check the condition in StreamExecPythonCorrelate and throws a friendly error message to info users that currently correlate does not support conditions.
What do you think?
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText: Check whether scan is defined? scan.isDefined() &&
timeline.author: hequn8128
